title: The Dukes of Berry and Burgundy Departing from Paris to Meet with the Duke of Bretagne
description: The Dukes of Berry and Burgundy Departing from Paris to Meet with the Duke of Bretagne; Master of the Getty Froissart (Flemish, active about 1475 - 1485); Bruges, Belgium; about 1480 - 1483; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 48 x 35 cm (18 7/8 x 13 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 7, fol. 307v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
